about_the_game:
Monocity


Monocity is a multiplayer real estate board game.
The game supports up to 20 players.

Gameplay


In each round: All players roll the dice together and move. The player who bids the highest price gets the land.
Collect resources, build buildings, upgrade them, increase population, use cards, trade with players, and more.
Make other players go bankrupt.

Content

(Dec 2023)

2 maps
11 types of land
2 types of resource
7 unique buildings
13 cards
AI Player
Map Editor
& more updates
